structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: As used in KRS 65.166 to 65.176, the word "district" shall mean any board, commission, or special district created pursuant to the following statutes: KRS 65.660 to 65.679; KRS 75.010 to 75.260; KRS 104.450 to 104.680; KRS 108.010 to 108.070; KRS 184.010 to 184.300; KRS 220.010 to 220.613; KRS 266.010 to 266.990; KRS 267.010 to 267.990; KRS 268.010 to 268.990; or KRS 269.100 to 269.270.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 429, sec. 12, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980.
